translation.en: You think I missed?
Well…
Off by four inches.
-♪ I'm wanted… ♪ -[man] Hey, Ross. You got any more of these black tarps?
translation.es: Oye, Rock,¿tienes más de estas lonas negras?

translation.en: Hey, what do you think you're doin'? I wanted those.
translation.es: ¿Qué crees que haces? Yo quería esas.

translation.en: Gotcha, Lou.
[Reagan] …and alleged ransom payments.
We did not, repeat, did not trade weapons or anything else for hostages,
translation.es: No intercambiamos armas ni cualquier otra cosa por rehenesy tampoco lo haremos.

translation.en: nor will we.
translation.es: ni cualquier otra cosa por rehenesy tampoco lo haremos.

translation.en: President Reagan addressing the heightened tensions with Iran
translation.es: El presidente Reaganabordó las tensiones con Irán

translation.en: in the wake of rumors -about the CIA's involvement… -[echoing] Lou.
translation.es: a raíz de los rumoressobre la participación de la CIA

translation.en: …in the country's 1953 coup.
translation.es: en el golpe de Estado de 1953.

translation.en: -Hey, Lou. -[phone ringing]
In other news, pages from the Rogers Commission's report
translation.es: Ahora pasamos al informede la Comisión Rogers

translation.en: on the Space Shuttle Challenger disaster, with NASA under fire…
translation.es: sobre el accidentedel transbordador espacial con la NASA en la mira…

translation.en: You, uh, ready for the big storm?
Makin' a withdrawal.
And, uh, how much will you be taking out today?
Ah, whatever's in there.
-[Reagan] …special position in Iran… -Oh. Okay.
Without Iran's cooperation, we cannot bring an end to the Persian Gulf War.
translation.es: …sin la cooperación de Irán, no podemos ponerle fina la guerra del Golfo Pérsico.

translation.en: -Oh! That is, uh… -Without Iran's…
translation.es: no podemos ponerle fina la guerra del Golfo Pérsico. Sin Irán… Es mucho dinero.

translation.en: -There's a lot of money. -…relationship with…
I know. I'm the one who put it in there.
translation.es: Ya lo sé. Yo lo puse ahí.

translation.en: If you'd like to place a call, please deposit 25 cents before dialing.
translation.es: Si desea hacer una llamada,ingrese 25 centavos antes de marcar.

translation.en: If you need help, please hang up and try your call again.
translation.es: Si necesita ayuda,cuelgue e intente llamar de nuevo.

translation.en: Afternoon, Lou.
Jax is in a good mood.
Can't help but wonder if the spark of the hunt hasn't got him all worked up.
translation.es: Me pregunto si lo habrá alteradoel fogonazo del arma.

translation.en: Unlikely. It isn't hunting season.
translation.es: No creo. No es temporada de caza.

translation.en: Deer must have just bolted out of nowhere.
translation.es: El ciervo apareció de la nada.

translation.en: Happened so fast.
Well, I'm glad you and Jax came out of it okay.
translation.es: Me alegra que tú y Jax salieran ilesos.

translation.en: You know, you ought to get yourself one of these copper bracelets.
translation.es: Deberías comprarteuna pulsera de cobre así.

translation.en: -Pretty. -My niece got it for me on the mainland.
translation.es: - Qué linda.- Me la compró mi sobrina.

translation.en: One of those stores, you know, with the dream catchers and crystals and whatnot.
translation.es: En una tienda de atrapasueños y cristalesen el continente.

translation.en: -[starts engine] -I laughed at her. But I swear to God, I barely feel the arthritis anymore.
translation.es: Me reí de ella, y juro por Diosque ya casi no siento la artritis.

translation.en: I'm fishin' again.
Careful you don't get struck by lightning wearin' that thing.
translation.es: Cuidado. Que no te caiga un rayo por eso.

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, that's right. -Mornin', Lou!
-[man] Got your ticket? -[woman] Of course! I got my ticket. [man] Well, I'm gonna be--
translation.es: - Claro. Tengo mi pastel.- Bueno, haré…

translation.en: -[man] Bridget Hoffman-- -[woman] I love--
[man] This is a severe weather watch.
The biggest storm the Pacific Northwest has seen in years
translation.es: La peor tormenta en añosen el noroeste del Pacífico

translation.en: is expected to make landfall early this evening.
Residents are encouraged to stay in their homes
translation.es: Se aconseja que se queden en sus casas

translation.en: and be prepared for downed power lines and flooding in low-lying areas.
translation.es: y que se preparen para inundacionesy cortes de electricidad.

translation.en: Ferry service to the San Juan Islands has also been suspended until further notice
translation.es: El servicio de ferri a las islas San Juanse ha suspendido hasta nuevo aviso,

translation.en: as the area is directly in the storm's path.
translation.es: ya que el áreaestá en el trayecto de la tormenta.

translation.en: [woman] Where could she be? I don't know.
She's not under this tree.
translation.es: No está debajo de este árbol.

translation.en: She's not over here.
Oh, she's so good at hiding.
Gotta find her.
Maybe she's inside.
Yeah, I'm gonna check there.
-I got you! -[squeals] -I got you! I got you! -[laughing]
-[giggling] -You didn't say the code! Little Rabbit.
Oh! Little Rabbit, Little Rabbit! -Little Rabbit! -[both laughing]
One more time.
-No. -Please.
I said no, Vee. Come on.
Pass me a nail?
Thanks.
Mom, do you think Daddy's gonna find the treasure soon?
translation.es: Mamá, ¿crees que papáencontrará el tesoro pronto?

translation.en: It's been two years.
I don't know, Vee. I bet he's real close.
translation.es: No sé, Vee. Seguramente le falte poco.

translation.en: And then is Daddy gonna come home?
You know, the storm looks like it's a while away.
translation.es: Parece que falta bastantepara que llegue la tormenta.

translation.en: We could probably fit in another game.
I bet you can't make it past three minutes before I find you, though.
translation.es: Seguro te encuentroantes de los tres minutos.

translation.en: -Oh, I can. -Oh, I don't think you can. Mm-mm.
All right. Let me see. Ready? Set…
-Game on! -[squeals] Game on!
One… two…
three… four…
five… six…
[sighs] Seven…
-Hey, Lou. -Rent. Tomorrow.
I know. Listen, now, I had to lay in supplies for the storm.
translation.es: Lo sé. Debí comprar provisionespor la tormenta. Quería saber…

translation.en: -So I was wondering whether-- -No extensions.
-[sighs] All right. -Tomorrow. Inside. On the table.
translation.es: Está bien. Mañana. Adentro. Sobre la mesa.

translation.en: It'll get wet in the mailbox. You'll get it.
translation.es: - Se mojará en el buzón.- Ahí lo tendrás.

translation.en: [yells] Vee!
What the hell is wrong with you?
Why you gotta drive so goddamn fast? You know there's a child nearby.
translation.es: Ve más despacio.Sabes que hay una niña cerca.

translation.en: World's not a playground. Teach your kid to look out for herself.
translation.es: No vivimos en un patio de juegos.Enséñale a cuidarse sola.

translation.en: Come on, Jax.
-[man] Hey. -[mother] Go inside.
-No, Mom! -Vee, go inside.
-Everything o-- okay? -[stamps]
And no stomping, little girl.
[man] Heading into town to get some supplies. -Can I get you anything? -[sighs]
-No. We're fine. Thanks, Chris. -[door slams]
-You doin' all right? -[sighing] Yeah, I'm just tired.
-[Chris] All right. -[sighs] [Chris] Is Lou still bein' a pain in your ass?
-[sighs] I told you about that? -[chuckling] Yeah.
Yeah, you don't… you don't remember? -No. -[sighs]
-Look, we were both pretty drunk, so… -Yeah.
translation.es: Los dos estábamos muy borrachos. - Sí.- Sí. Claramente.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Clearly, 'cause I… I don't remember that.
translation.es: - Sí.- Sí. Claramente. Porque no recuerdo eso.

translation.en: I do remember you singing "Like A Virgin" at the top of your lungs.
translation.es: Sí que cantabas "Like A Virgin"a todo pulmón.

translation.en: Oh, please swear you'll never tell.
translation.es: No se lo cuentes a nadie.

translation.en: Or what?
I don't know.
Or, uh…
[Vee] Mom! I can't find Mr. Hippo!
-Ah. -[chuckles] Listen, I gotta go.
Hey, have you, um…
-[Chris sighs] -[Vee] Mom, help me find him.
Have you had a chance to talk to Vee yet?
About her dad?
[Chris] You all right?
-Any way I could get a ride? -Yeah, of course. -Get in here. -Thank you.
-Yeah, yeah. -Thank you.
[grunts] Sorry about that.
[man] Oh, damn rental car broke down on me. You're a lifesaver. [laughs]
translation.es: Se rompió el auto que alquilé.Me salvaste la vida.

translation.en: Oh, jeez, I'm-- I'm gettin' your seat all soaked.
translation.es: ¡Cielos! Voy a empapar todo el asiento.

translation.en: Don't worry about it, man. I'm just glad I passed you when I did.
-[man] Oh. -[Chris] The storm's gonna be gnarly.
Heavy reading.
Yeah, I bought it for a friend of mine.
translation.es: Sí, se lo compré a una amiga.

translation.en: Her ex died three months ago, and she's just-- she's havin' a hard time facin' it.
translation.es: Su ex murió hace tres meses.Le cuesta afrontarlo.

translation.en: I see. And you wanna help her face it, right? Hm? 'Cause you wanna be more than just friends?
translation.es: Claro. Y tú quieres ayudarlapara ser más que un amigo, ¿no?

translation.en: Oh, look, I just-- She has a kid. She wants to take it slow.
translation.es: No, yo… Tiene una hija. Quiere ir despacio.

translation.en: Oh! I love this band.
Oh, Jeff Porcaro's the man. -Oh, yeah. He's the best. -♪ …things that you say that you'll do ♪
translation.es: - Jeff Porcaro es increíble.- Sí. Es el mejor.

translation.en: [Chris] Ah! Fuck! What the fuck?
-[sighs] -[thunder rumbling]
Vee…
Vee, look at me.
You know when you were asking about Daddy earlier?
Well, um… [sighs]
Baby, he, um…
He loves you so much.
And he thinks about you all the time.
translation.es: Y piensa todo el tiempo en ti.

translation.en: What are we making?
-Friendship bracelets. -Oh.
I wanna make a friendship bracelet.
This one is for Lou.
You're making a bracelet for Lou? Why?
translation.es: ¿Por qué le haces una a Lou?

translation.en: I like Lou.
-I know you don't. -Yeah, I do.
translation.es: Sé que a ti no. Claro que sí.

translation.en: Okay. I actually don't like Lou. But why do you like her?
translation.es: Está bien. No me agrada Lou,pero ¿por qué a ti sí?

translation.en: Well, Jax likes her, and I like Jax.
translation.es: Bueno, a Jax le agrada,y a mí me agrada Jax.

translation.en: [Lou] "I've never been one for many words, so I'll keep this short."
translation.es: Nunca he sidouna mujer de muchas palabras, así que seré breve.

translation.en: "The house is yours. Sell it."
"There's a month's worth of meat for Jax in the freezer, and some cash for you."
translation.es: Hay carne para un mes para Jaxen el congelador y algo de dinero para ti.

translation.en: "There are certain decisions I made that you will never understand."
translation.es: Hay ciertas decisiones que toméque nunca entenderás.

translation.en: "But that's all in the past now."
translation.es: Pero eso ya es parte del pasado.

translation.en: "Life can be cruel."
"What made me great at some things made me lousy at others."
translation.es: Era excelente para algunas cosasy pésima para otras.

translation.en: "I wish I could say that some good came from what I did."
translation.es: Ojalá pudiera decirque algo bueno salió de lo que hice.

translation.en: "In truth,
I left the world a more dangerous place."
translation.es: hice del mundo un lugar más peligroso.

translation.en: -Bedtime, now! -[squealing]
-Okay. -[laughs] My pillow! [sighs] Okay, lay down.
translation.es: - La almohada. ¡Mi muñeco!- Acuéstate. Estoy agotada.

translation.en: -Mr. Hippo! -I'm exhausted. Come on, Mr. Hippo.
translation.es: - La almohada. ¡Mi muñeco!- Acuéstate. Estoy agotada. - Vamos, Hipopótamo. Buenas noches.- Tengo calor.

translation.en: -Good night. -I'm hot.
translation.es: - Vamos, Hipopótamo. Buenas noches.- Tengo calor.

translation.en: Yeah, now I'm hot too. But you'll be cold soon because it's raining.
translation.es: Yo también, pero pronto tendrás frío,porque está lloviendo.

translation.en: Oh, it's just the wind, baby. Don't be scared.
translation.es: Es el viento. No tengas miedo.

translation.en: -I'm not scared. -Okay.
-Are you scared? -Do you wanna sleep with me tonight?
translation.es: - Bien.- ¿Tú tienes miedo? - ¿Quieres dormir conmigo?- Solo si lo necesitas.

translation.en: -Oh, if you need me to, I will. -I think I do.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres dormir conmigo?- Solo si lo necesitas. Creo que sí.

translation.en: Oh shit.
Shit, shit, shit, shit!
-Vee… -[chuckles]
-Watch your mouth. -Shit!
-Hey! -[lamp plays tune] Do not test my patience, little lady. [laughing]
translation.es: No pongas a prueba mi paciencia, señorita.

translation.en: I'm just gonna go flip the breaker.
I'll be right back, okay?
Mommy?
Is that you?
Chris!
Oh! Vee!
[gasping] No! Vee!
Vee!
Vee! Vee! Vee! Vee? Vee!
-Where's your phone? -What the hell?
Where's your goddamn phone? I gotta call the sheriff.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está tu teléfono?Debo llamar al alguacil.

translation.en: -[gasps] God damn it! Fuck! -[Lou] Slow down. What happened?
-[gasps] Vee's gone. -What, you let her wander off again?
translation.es: Vee no está. ¿La dejaste vagar de nuevo? No irá lejos.

translation.en: -She's not gonna get far in this. -No, no, no.
translation.es: ¿La dejaste vagar de nuevo? No irá lejos. No. Se la llevó el padre.

translation.en: -Her father took her. -Her father?
translation.es: No. Se la llevó el padre. ¿El padre?

translation.en: He's… he's here. How the hell is he here?
Hold on. You saw him?
No. I…
He… he's supposed to be dead, but he found us.
translation.es: Se supone que está muerto,pero nos encontró.

translation.en: I-- I thought we were free of him.
translation.es: Creí que nos habíamos librado de él.Mató a Chris.

translation.en: -He killed Chris. -Jesus Christ.
translation.es: Creí que nos habíamos librado de él.Mató a Chris. Por Dios.

translation.en: Where are your keys? The car won't start. I gotta get to the sheriff.
translation.es: ¿Y tus llaves? Mi auto no arranca.Debo ir a ver al alguacil.

translation.en: -[Lou] I'll drive. -Okay.
-[engine coughing] -No, no, no, no, no! Come on!
-What's wrong? -Run!
What?
-[melody plays] -[Lou] Down!
Ho-- how did you know it was gonna blow up?
Bombs tend to.
-[whining] -Sorry about that, buddy. Turns out I'm not done yet.
A bomb? It means he's been plannin' this, Lou.
translation.es: ¿Una bomba?Entonces, él lo ha estado planeando, Lou.

translation.en: We gotta get more help. We need to get to the sheriff.
Can't get to him. No cars. Phones are down.
We're ten miles outside of town.
Your kid's gettin' further away by the second.
translation.es: Y tu hija se aleja cada vez más.Tengo que rastrearlo.

translation.en: -I have to track 'em. -What?
translation.es: Y tu hija se aleja cada vez más.Tengo que rastrearlo. ¿Qué?

translation.en: Track 'em? You?
[Lou] Get batteries. Kitchen.
You don't understand. Philip was a Green Beret.
Wanted for some terrible shit that he did in Central America.
translation.es: Lo buscaban por algo terribleque hizo en Centroamérica.

translation.en: War crimes kind of shit.
I saw the court transcripts. He was torturing hostages for fun.
translation.es: Vi los archivos.Torturaba rehenes por diversión.

translation.en: He's highly trained. An explosives expert. Well, we're no match for him, Lou.
translation.es: Está muy entrenado. Es experto en explosivos.No podemos ganarle, Lou.

translation.en: We need professional help. You and the dog ain't gonna cut it.
translation.es: Necesitamos ayuda profesional.Tú y el perro no podrán con él.

translation.en: Did he take anything from your trailer?
[mother] Her-- her favorite stuffy, Mr. Hippo.
translation.es: Su peluche, el señor Hipopótamo,y una manta.

translation.en: -And a-- a blanket. -He wants her comfortable.
translation.es: Su peluche, el señor Hipopótamo,y una manta. Quiere que esté cómoda.

translation.en: He wants her quiet.
Renovations.
When they tried to arrest him, he blew his apartment up.
They sent a death certificate. How the hell could he still be alive?
translation.es: Tengo el certificado de defunción.No podía seguir vivo.

translation.en: [Lou] Halothane. Sleeping gas.
You're lucky it didn't knock you out.
translation.es: Por suerte no te dejó inconsciente.

translation.en: [Lou] He's pullin' her in somethin'.
If he gets her off the island, this will get a lot messier.
translation.es: Si la saca de la isla,esto será mucho más complicado.

translation.en: Airport and ferry are closed.
Private vessel. He's headed to the coast.
translation.es: Barco privado. Se dirige a la costa.

translation.en: He's got a head start. I gotta move fast.
translation.es: Tiene ventaja.Debo ir rápido. Quédate aquí.

translation.en: Stay here. The storm clears, head into town.
translation.es: Tiene ventaja.Debo ir rápido. Quédate aquí. Si amaina, ve al pueblo.Llama al alguacil no bien veas una casa.

translation.en: First house you see, call the sheriff.
translation.es: Si amaina, ve al pueblo.Llama al alguacil no bien veas una casa.

translation.en: -Hey, where are you goin'? -To find my child.
translation.es: - ¿Adónde vas?- A encontrar a mi hija.

translation.en: You don't know what you're doing.
If you slow me down, I will leave you behind.
translation.es: Si me retrasas, te dejaré atrás.

translation.en: Jax. Right on.
[man] You can't see shit.
We're close. We're clearing the ridge. We'll be there shortly.
-[thump] -[Philip] Fuckin' idiots.
No. No, no, no. It's okay.
I know it's been a while.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no nos vemos.

translation.en: Maybe this'll jog your memory.
translation.es: Quizá esto te refresque la memoria.

translation.en: Here's the church…
Here's the steeple…
Open it up and…
It's you.
Yes, it is. It's-- it's me.
It's me, sweetie.
You came back from your adventure.
I sure did.
And… and I even brought you a present.
translation.es: Y hasta te traje un regalo.

translation.en: Is it part of the treasure?
Uh, treasure? Yeah!
Yeah, it sure is.
And… you and I are gonna go on our own adventure together.
translation.es: Y tú y yo nos embarcaremosen nuestra propia aventura.

translation.en: Where's Mo-- Where's Mommy? Is she coming with us?
Yeah, of course she is. Of course she is.
I left her a note and some clues to follow us,
translation.es: Le dejé una notay unas pistas para que nos siguiera.

translation.en: and she's gonna meet up with us after, okay?
translation.es: Se reunirá con nosotros más tarde, ¿sí?

translation.en: What do you say?
Thank you, Daddy.
-Okay. -[man on radio] Do you copy?
Come on. Get on radio.
-Do you copy? -All right, I've gotta do one more thing.
translation.es: Muy bien, tengo que hacer algo más.

translation.en: And then you and I are gonna start our adventure together.
See, you put these on… All right, like that.
Okay?
[Lou] Here.
[mother] You see anything?
-[Lou] You know them? -Tony and Gerry. They served with Philip.
translation.es: - ¿Los conoces?- Tony y Gerry. Sirvieron con Philip.

translation.en: They're just as vicious as he is. Come on.
translation.es: - Son tan despiadados como él.- Vamos.

translation.en: Stay down. Your jacket might as well have a target painted on it.
translation.es: Agáchate. Usar esa chaquetaes como tener un blanco pintado.

translation.en: -[sighs] -We wait.
Suppose this is just a distraction? Buying him more time to get away with Vee.
translation.es: ¿Y si es una distracción? Para ganar más tiempo.A él le gustan estos juegos.

translation.en: It's the kind of game he likes to play.
translation.es: Para ganar más tiempo.A él le gustan estos juegos.

translation.en: Danglin' somethin' shiny in front of you, and you don't notice when he's about to bash you over your goddamn head.
translation.es: Te tienta con algo para que no veasque está a punto de golpearte la cabeza.

translation.en: [grunts] Do you know how to use this?
Mmm, yeah. [grunts]
translation.es: Sí. Tomé clases después de dejarlo.

translation.en: -I took lessons after I left him. -All right, I'm gonna go have a look.
translation.es: Sí. Tomé clases después de dejarlo. Bien, iré a ver.

translation.en: If anybody gets too close, use this.
translation.es: Si alguien se acerca demasiado, usa esto.

translation.en: Go for the eyes. A man can't kill what he can't see.
translation.es: Atácalo a los ojos.No puedes matar lo que no ves.

translation.en: -How do you know all this? -Girl Scouts.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo sabes tanto?- Fui una niña exploradora.

translation.en: Jax. Stay.
[man 1] All right, no one's gonna follow him in this shit.
translation.es: Nadie lo seguirá en esta mierda.

translation.en: I'm telling you, this feels like another one of Philip's fucked-up games.
translation.es: Parece otro de los juegos perversosde Philip.

translation.en: Hello?
Oh, excuse me. I'm completely turned around out here. I--
I… I was looking for my dog. The poor little guy--
translation.es: Estaba buscando a mi perro. El pobrecito…

translation.en: I haven't seen any dogs.
translation.es: - No he visto ningún perro.- Bien.

translation.en: Okay. Do… do you have a phone I could use?
translation.es: - No he visto ningún perro.- Bien. ¿Tienes un teléfono que pueda usar?

translation.en: -I just want-- -Are you alone?
Unfortunately. Um…
Look, I-- I don't think I can make it the three hours back home, but…
translation.es: No creo que pueda llegar a casaen las próximas horas,

translation.en: if I could just rest and get my… my bearings?
translation.es: pero si pudiera descansar y orientarme…

translation.en: Christ.
-Okay. Just two minutes. -Oh!
Thank you so much.
Oh shit.
[Lou] Oh, bless your heart.
Oh, good morning.
She lost her dog, man. She's soaked.
Just need to get my blood movin' again.
translation.es: Solo necesito que me corra la sangre.

translation.en: My goodness. Quite a storm out there.
-Oh. -[man 2] What's your name?
Oh, sorry, I'm-- I'm Martha. Flemming.
But you might know my husband, Gordon.
translation.es: Quizá conozcas a mi esposo. Trabaja…

translation.en: -He works at the-- -I don't.
translation.es: Quizá conozcas a mi esposo. Trabaja… No lo conozco.

translation.en: Here. Why don't you grab a seat?
-Give those cold feet a break. -They sure could use it.
translation.es: - Dale un respiro a esos pies fríos.- Les vendría bien.

translation.en: Thank you.
[whispers] Thank you so much.
-Oof… -So… been on this island long?
-Oh, 32 years. -I don't get the appeal.
translation.es: Sí, 32 años. No entiendo el atractivo.Es difícil llegar. Tiene mal clima.

translation.en: It's a pain in the ass to get to. -Weather's shit. [chuckles] -[sighs]
translation.es: No entiendo el atractivo.Es difícil llegar. Tiene mal clima.

translation.en: It's an acquired taste. [chuckles]
I love it, though.
-Good place to hide, I reckon. -Hmm.
Come on, Tony, relax. She's just an old lady.
[breathing shakily] The soup smells so good.
So nice and warm in here.
That must be my Jax.
Sit down, Martha.
Where is he taking her?
Where…
…is he taking her?
[groans] Eagle Bay.
And then where?
[Tony] I don't know.
I swear. That's all I know.
translation.es: Lo juro. Eso es todo lo que sé.

translation.en: You gonna shoot me?
Things, uh…
escalated.
[sighs] Jax. What'd I tell you about that?
Gerry, he say anything about Vee before you killed him?
translation.es: ¿Gerry dijo algo sobre Veeantes de que lo mataras?

translation.en: Not a word.
Here. Take this outside. Go through it.
Hello? Come on!
Turn that thing off.
-We might be able to reach the sheriff. -Not in this weather.
translation.es: - Podríamos llamar al alguacil.- No con este clima.

translation.en: More likely it'll tip off Philip.
-What channel would the emergency-- -Don't argue with me. Leave it.
Unbelievable.
You know, I was in the Girl Scouts, too.
Got my archery badge, pen pal, first aid.
translation.es: Aprendí tiro al arco, primeros auxilios…

translation.en: There wasn't one for hand-to-hand combat or murder with household objects.
translation.es: No aprendí a luchar cuerpo a cuerponi a matar con objetos domésticos.

translation.en: Really? Must've just been my troop, then.
translation.es: ¿No? Habrá sido solo en mi grupo.

translation.en: What branch of the military were you in?
CIA.
26 years in the field.
A spy?
-Wouldn't have guessed that. -Be a shit spy if you did.
translation.es: - Jamás lo hubiese imaginado.- Sería una espía pésima si se notara.

translation.en: -Come on, Jax. -[whines]
-[Vee] Daddy? -[Philip] Yeah!
I need to pee.
-[Philip] Can-- can you hold it? -[Vee] Nuh-uh.
-♪ That guide me towards salvation… ♪ -[Philip] Okay. Short break.
-Hello? -[static]
Damn it.
Hello, hello. Is anyone there?
Let's go!
[Philip] Okay, come on, Vee.
Vee?
Vee!
Let me see?
Yeah. No, he's got-- he's got a bad wing, Vee.
translation.es: Sí, tiene un ala lastimada, Vee.

translation.en: Yeah. You know…
sometimes, in nature, when a…
creature's damaged…
there's nothing you can do to save them.
translation.es: no podemos hacer nada para salvarla.

translation.en: It's almost like they were meant to die.
translation.es: Como si estuviera destinada a morir.

translation.en: [Vee] But maybe he's just tired.
Maybe. Yeah.
Uh… Here. We'll put him right up here.
-All right. Come on. -Wait, I haven't peed yet.
translation.es: - Bien. Vamos.- Espera, aún no hice pis.

translation.en: Come on, Vee. Now!
[Lou] Fuck!
-Fuck. -What's hurtin'?
Nothin'.
Come on. We gotta keep movin'.
-[music stops] -[Philip] Fucking kidding me! Damn it. Fuck!
Hi. We have to walk now, okay?
-I need a break. -Huh?
I need a break to warm up.
No time, Lou.
He takes breaks too. I can tell by the tracks. Come on.
translation.es: Él también descansa.Me doy cuenta por las huellas. Vamos.

translation.en: [Lou] Oh, God damn it!
[sighs] Oh shit.
I'm not too cold.
You?
Shit. [gasps]
[Lou] You walked a long way on that. You should've said somethin'.
translation.es: Caminaste mucho así. Debiste decir algo.

translation.en: And give you an excuse to abandon me?
Is that for me? No.
Well, can I have some?
Thanks.
And yet you stayed.
Well, should've done somethin'.
[mother] Yeah.
Thanks, Lou. That's… very helpful.
Just saying you could've left him sooner.
What is it you know about being with someone like him?
translation.es: ¿Qué sabes de estar con alguien como él?

translation.en: So maybe don't tell me what I should have done.
I didn't recognize who I was with him.
translation.es: No reconocía quién era con él.

translation.en: I actually felt I could fix him.
translation.es: Sentía que podía ayudarlo a mejorar.

translation.en: You know, when we met, he was loving, he was caring…
translation.es: Cuando nos conocimos, era amoroso. Era cariñoso, pero estaba destrozado.

translation.en: But so broken.
For so long, I thought… thought it was all me.
translation.es: Durante mucho tiempo,pensé que era todo mi culpa.

translation.en: I thought…
[sighs] "Why am I failing him? Why isn't my love enough?"
translation.es: "¿Por qué lo defraudo? ¿Por qué mi amor no es suficiente?".

translation.en: I don't know.
That son of a bitch is a monster.
translation.es: Ese hijo de puta es un monstruo.

translation.en: Whatever the hell made him this way.
translation.es: No sé qué fue lo que lo hizo así,

translation.en: There ain't no amount of love in this entire world that's gonna be able to save that man.
translation.es: pero no hay amor suficiente en este mundoque pueda salvar a ese hombre.

translation.en: He ever hurt Vee?
Not yet.
When he would get into his moods,
translation.es: Cuando él estaba de mal humor,

translation.en: I'd whisper to her, "Game on,"
and she'd run and hide.
Actually made it into a… a goddamn game.
translation.es: De hecho, lo convertimos en un juego.

translation.en: How pathetic is that?
[sniffling] He always said, if I took Vee away, he'd kill us both.
translation.es: Siempre dijo que si me llevaba a Vee,nos mataría a las dos.

translation.en: Go on… Tell me what I should've done.
I guess we've all been through things other people will never understand.
translation.es: Todos hemos pasado por cosasque otros nunca entenderán.

translation.en: Hannah?
We'll get her back.
Come on.
[Hannah murmurs] Oh, shit, shit, shit, shit.
-[panting] -Slow and steady.
Home, Jax.
No arguments. Home. Now!
Oh shit.
How the hell did he do this with Vee?
Gotta climb around it. Oh shit.
-Aah! -Come on!
[Lou] I got you.
[Lou] Good job.
[Lou] Shit.
[groans] Jesus.
[grunts] Not now. God damn it.
-Lou, what's the matter? -Nothing.
-[gasps] -Lou! [screams]
Oh God. Lou, wake up. Lou.
-[yells] -Oh, thank God.
Let me help you up. -[grunts] Get off me. -[gasps]
I can help you if you just let me.
[Lou] I don't need your help.
-[crack] -[groans] Oh, fuck!
[grunts] Get up. We just lost an hour on him.
translation.es: Levántate. Se nos adelantó una hora.

translation.en: Hey, I told you to leave that behind.
Storm's passed. I'm gonna climb up to that hilltop.
translation.es: Ya pasó la tormenta.Subiré esa colina y trataré de conectarme.

translation.en: -Try to connect. -There's no time.
translation.es: Ya pasó la tormenta.Subiré esa colina y trataré de conectarme. No hay tiempo.

translation.en: God damn it. Can you stop bein' so stubborn? We need help.
translation.es: Deja de ser tan terca. Necesitamos ayuda.

translation.en: -There is no one who can help us. -[sighs] Shit.
translation.es: Nadie puede ayudarnos.Solo cuentas conmigo. Sigue moviéndote.

translation.en: -I'm all you've got. Now keep movin'. -[sighs] Why are you helpin' me, Lou?
translation.es: Nadie puede ayudarnos.Solo cuentas conmigo. Sigue moviéndote. - ¿Por qué me ayudas, Lou?- Bahía del Águila está adelante.

translation.en: -Huh? -Eagle Bay's just ahead.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué me ayudas, Lou?- Bahía del Águila está adelante.

translation.en: -Don't slow me down. -God damn it.
[sighs] We missed them.
No one's comin' or goin' in water this rough.
translation.es: Nadie llega ni sale en agua tan agitada.

translation.en: -[Hannah] Then what's his plan? -Over here.
translation.es: ¿Y cuál es su plan? Por aquí.

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Hannah] Vee!
Vee!
-Where did you take her? -Stop.
-[muffled sobs] -He's fucking with you.
We can do this all day.
[Lou] Maybe you're right. Maybe we do need help.
translation.es: Quizá tengas razón y necesitemos ayuda.

translation.en: Go back to that hill.
See if you can raise Rankin. Emergency services are channel 16.
translation.es: Intenta llamar a Rankin.El canal para emergencias es el 16.

translation.en: Meet me back here when you're done.
Thank you.
What are you gonna do?
[Lou] I need to rest. [gasping] Go on.
Hey, hold up.
Try not to blow your brains out.
There we are. [chuckles]
Frozen in time.
Together forever.
Wanna do another one?
Did you know…
that there are handprints like these in caves all over the world?
translation.es: que hay huellas como estasen cuevas de todo el mundo?

translation.en: And long after you and Mommy and I are all dead…
translation.es: Y mucho despuésde que tú, mamá y yo estemos muertos,

translation.en: these handprints are still gonna be here.
[groans] Hello?
[Hannah, breaking up] Hello? Can anyone hear me? Hello?
Can anybody hear me?
Hello?
Hello, anybody?
-God damn it. -This is Sheriff Rankin.
translation.es: Hola, ¿hay alguien ahí? Maldita sea. Habla el alguacil Rankin. ¿Quién es?

translation.en: -[gasps] -Who is this? Over.
Sheriff! [laughs] Sheriff Rankin.
Oh God. Thank God. This is-- this is Hannah Dawson.
translation.es: Gracias a Dios. Habla Hannah Dawson.

translation.en: [breaking up] …kidnapped. Kidnapped?
Hannah, can you hear me?
Can you repeat that, please?
[gasps] My daughter was kidnapped by her father.
translation.es: El padre de mi hija secuestró a Vee.

translation.en: [voice breaking up] I'm…
Lou Adell is with me… Hannah, can you please confirm?
translation.es: - Estoy con Lou Adell.- Hannah, ¿me lo confirmas?

translation.en: [breaking up] Hannah Dawson? Can you hear me? What?
Say that… say that again?
-Come on, come on, come on. -[static]
Sheriff?
[sighs] Oh fuck. Okay…
Shit.
Torres, come in.
-[Torres] Go, Sheriff. -Listen, we got a situation.
This is gonna sound a bit crazy,
but I think Hannah Dawson's daughter has been kidnapped by… by her father.
translation.es: pero creo que a la hija de Hannah Dawsonla secuestró el padre.

translation.en: What?
Listen, let's put it on the wire, right away, in case she's taken off the island.
translation.es: Pongámoslo en el boletín de inmediatoen caso de que se la lleve de la isla.

translation.en: Okay? Hannah and Vee Dawson and Lou Adell. I think she mentioned Lou.
translation.es: Hannah, Vee Dawson y Lou Adell.Creo que mencionó a Lou.

translation.en: The guns.
Slowly.
Hello, Philip.
Don't worry about her.
I've made sure she'll sleep through this.
translation.es: Me aseguré de que no se despierte ahora.

translation.en: Just tell me one thing. And be honest here.
translation.es: Solo dime una cosa y sé sincera.

translation.en: Why'd you sell me out?
I knew you'd track down Hannah and Vee sooner or later.
translation.es: Sabía que rastrearías a Hannah y a Vee.

translation.en: I wasn't gonna be able to protect them forever.
Protect them? [scoffs] All of this is happening because of you.
translation.es: ¿Protegerlas?Todo esto está pasando por tu culpa.

translation.en: Okay? And Hannah may be too naive to-- to see it, but I don't.
translation.es: Hannah es demasiado ingenua para verlo,pero yo no.

translation.en: Hannah doesn't know who I am.
You still can't even admit I'm your son.
translation.es: Aún no puedes admitir que soy tu hijo.

translation.en: So what's the plan, Philip? Why the elaborate chase?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es el plan?¿A qué se debe esta persecución?

translation.en: Why let us track you? You don't wanna hurt your kid.
translation.es: ¿Por qué nos dejas rastrearte?No lastimes a tu hija.

translation.en: Did you know that Vee is the same age as I was when those-- those men took me?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que Vee tiene la misma edadque yo cuando me secuestraron?

translation.en: Yeah, but they weren't as nice as, uh…
translation.es: Pero esos tipos no fueron tan amables…

translation.en: as I'm being to her.
Can you appreciate that? The symmetry of that?
I thought my mommy was comin' back to save me, too.
translation.es: Yo también creí que mi mamá me salvaría.

translation.en: It was a trap. If I'd tried to save you, they would have had us both.
translation.es: Era una trampa. Nos habrían capturado a ambos.

translation.en: Bullshit. You wanted to maintain your cover.
I was a pawn for your mission. Nothin' else.
translation.es: Fui un peón para tu misión. Nada más.

translation.en: -I had you rescued. I got you out of Iran. -Then why didn't you come back with me?
translation.es: Hice que te rescataran. Te saqué de Irán. ¿Por qué no regresaste conmigo?He aquí por qué.

translation.en: Here's why.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no regresaste conmigo?He aquí por qué.

translation.en: Because you chose the fucking CIA over your own child.
translation.es: Porque elegiste a la maldita CIAantes que a tu propio hijo.

translation.en: Yeah, how'd that work out for you? Hmm?
I mean, did you guys fuck up anything worse than you fucked up Iran?
And then you steal my wife and-- and my kid--
translation.es: Luego te llevaste a mi mujer y a mi hija…

translation.en: Hannah and Vee had nothing to do with my mistakes. Leave them out of this.
translation.es: No tienen nada que ver con mis errores.No las involucres.

translation.en: Oh, spare me the fuckin' morality lesson.
You gave up that right a long time ago.
translation.es: Renunciaste a ese derecho hace mucho.

translation.en: It's not too late.
You move, I'mma put a bullet in you.
It's not too late.
Leave Vee with me and go.
I'll throw them off your trail.
Philip, listen to me.
You're right.
I didn't protect you when you were a kid. So let me do it now.
translation.es: No te protegí cuando eras niño.Déjame hacerlo ahora.

translation.en: Shut up.
What, you wanna kill me?
Do it.
Before I knew you took Vee last night, I had my rifle pressed against my head.
translation.es: Antes de que te llevaras a Vee,iba a suicidarme.

translation.en: I'm not afraid to go.
[mumbles] You just can't stop messin' with my head, can't you?
Kid, I wouldn't even know where to start.
The minute I heard you blew yourself up, I knew it was time.
translation.es: Oí lo del incendio y supe que era hora.

translation.en: I thought Hannah and Vee were safe. My mission was complete.
translation.es: Creí que ellas estaban a salvo.Había cumplido mi misión.

translation.en: But you tricked me there, didn't you?
You always were smarter than me.
Beat my ass at chess when you were five years old.
translation.es: A los cinco años,ya me ganabas en el ajedrez.

translation.en: Remember that?
I do.
Oh, Philip.
You know what?
For once, we're playin' my game.
translation.es: Estamos jugando mi juego para variar.

translation.en: It's time to end this legacy.
translation.es: Hay que acabar con este legado.

translation.en: Put this whole family out of its misery.
translation.es: Terminaré con el sufrimientode esta familia.

translation.en: Philip, you're her father.
And you're my mother.
Mom! Mom!
We'll be waiting for you at the lighthouse.
translation.es: Te estaremos esperando en el faro.

translation.en: Make sure you bring Hannah.
Don't take too long.
Fuck.
[man on radio] Just checking in on ya. How are you doing out there?
translation.es: Quería ver cómo estaban. ¿Cómo les va ahí?

translation.en: -Talk to me, Deputy. -Still no hits on the APBs.
translation.es: Bien, dime. Aún no hay novedades.

translation.en: I notified ATF about the bomb in the truck and the coroner about the body.
translation.es: Notifiqué a las autoridadessobre la bomba y el cuerpo.

translation.en: They're sending teams when the weather lets up.
Orcas Island Sheriff's Department.
translation.es: Departamento del Alguacil de Isla Orcas.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Sheriff, it's the federal marshals.
-This is Rankin. Who's this? -Sheriff, Dominick Crown here.
translation.es: Habla Rankin. ¿Quién es? Dominick Crown.¿Recibió nuestra transmisión de fax?

translation.en: Did you receive our facsimile transmission?
translation.es: Dominick Crown.¿Recibió nuestra transmisión de fax?

translation.en: Yeah, I got it right here.
We've seen the APB for the woman you know as Lou Adell.
translation.es: Vimos el informede la mujer que conoce como Lou Adell.

translation.en: Is she a match for the person in that photo?
[Rankin] Yeah. Yeah, it sure looks like her.
-How confident are you, Sheriff? -It's her.
-[fax machine whirs] -And the second individual?
-[bleep] -[Rankin] Hang on one second.
Do you recognize him?
No. Are you telling me that this guy is involved?
Do you have any intel on the location of these individuals?
translation.es: ¿Sabe algo sobre la ubicaciónde estas personas?

translation.en: -Are they together? -Well, I don't know if they're together.
What I believe is that they're headed to Eagle Bay, on the west side of our island.
translation.es: Creo que se dirigen a Bahía del Águila,en el oeste de la isla.

translation.en: We need to make sure no civilians go anywhere near that location. Set up roadblocks and cordon the area.
translation.es: Que ningún civil se acerque a ese lugar.Pongan barricadas y acordonen la zona.

translation.en: There's a kidnapped girl and her mother out there.
translation.es: Hay una niña secuestrada y está su madre.

translation.en: -Hold. -Excuse me?
Asshole put me on hold. Unbelievable.
translation.es: El imbécil me puso en espera. Increíble.

translation.en: Un-fuckin'-believable.
-[marshal] Sheriff Rankin? -Yeah, right here.
translation.es: - No lo puedo creer.- ¿Rankin? Sí, aquí.

translation.en: The male fugitive is US Army Special Forces,
translation.es: El hombre es un militarde las Fuerzas Especiales

translation.en: convicted in the murder of numerous civilians.
translation.es: condenado por asesinar a varios civiles.

translation.en: The female is a high-priority target for the CIA.
translation.es: La mujer es un objetivo prioritariode la CIA.

translation.en: The CIA? Lou Adell?
This investigation is now under the jurisdiction of the US Marshals.
translation.es: Esta investigacióncorresponde a la jurisdicción federal.

translation.en: Lethal force has been authorized.
Do not allow any approach to Eagle Bay.
translation.es: Que nadie se acerque a Bahía del Águila.Ni oficiales…

translation.en: -Not by your department, not-- -Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.es: Que nadie se acerque a Bahía del Águila.Ni oficiales… Pero hay una niña secuestraday su madre está allí.

translation.en: There-- there is a kidnapped girl and her mother out there.
translation.es: Pero hay una niña secuestraday su madre está allí.

translation.en: Stay out of our way, Sheriff.
[Hannah] Lou, sorry it took me so long.
translation.es: BOTIQUÍN DE PRIMEROS AUXILIOS Lou, perdón por haber tardado tanto.

translation.en: I tried to get as high as I could, but…
translation.es: Intenté subir lo más alto que pude, pero…

translation.en: -[groans] -Jesus. Oh shit.
Oh God, oh God, oh God. Okay, wait, wait. Let me help. Let me help.
-Did he do this? -[groans]
And Vee? Is she… is she all right?
She's okay for now. He's taking her to the lighthouse.
translation.es: Está bien por ahora. La llevará al faro.

translation.en: -Okay, wait, wait, wait. -Wait. -Move your hand right now. -Okay…
Do it quick--
-[groans] -Oh shit.
-Pack the wound. -I'm coming. I'm coming. I'm coming.
Fill it with gauze. As-- as much as you can.
translation.es: Llénala todo lo que puedas con gasa.

translation.en: -Oh shit. -Come on, deeper.
translation.es: - Mierda.- Vamos, más profundo. Pon mucha.

translation.en: -Really pack it in. [grunts] -I'm trying.
translation.es: - Mierda.- Vamos, más profundo. Pon mucha. Eso intento. Cielos, Lou.Perdón por haberte metido en esto.

translation.en: -[groans] -Jesus, Lou. -I'm so sorry I dragged you into this. -[moans]
translation.es: Eso intento. Cielos, Lou.Perdón por haberte metido en esto.

translation.en: Put your hand here. Right. Press down. Okay, good. I gotta-- I gotta grab some tape.
translation.es: Pon tu mano aquí. Presiona.Tengo que agarrar cinta.

translation.en: Hannah. Did you reach the sheriff?
-Uh, I don't know. -Leave it.
-[Hannah] Wait, uh-- -It's fine.
I found those at the cabin. I meant to tell you.
translation.es: Las encontré en la cabaña.Iba a contártelo.

translation.en: You're lying.
This message isn't for me, is it?
translation.es: Este mensaje no es para mí, ¿verdad?

translation.en: [sighs] None of them are.
Say it.
I need you to say it.
Say it!
He's… my son.
When I was stationed in Iran, I had to get close to a very dangerous man.
translation.es: Cuando estuve en Irán, tuve que acercarmea un hombre muy peligroso.

translation.en: -[gasps] -Very close.
No, no, no, no.
I kept the baby to keep my cover.
translation.es: Tuve al bebé para mantener mi fachada.

translation.en: You mean… you mean Philip? The baby? You mean your son?
translation.es: ¿Te refieres a Philip?¿Tu bebé? ¿Te refieres a tu hijo?

translation.en: So what is this? Some game?
You fucking with me? What, you tell him where we were, or…
-What-- what is this? -No. I wasn't helping him.
translation.es: - No.- Dime. No lo ayudaba a él.

translation.en: -I was helping you. You and Vee. -Stop lying to me.
translation.es: - Las ayudaba a ti y a Vee.- No mientas más.

translation.en: -Tell me the goddamn truth! -[yells]
I got you to this island.
translation.es: Yo te traje a esta isla.

translation.en: Your old friend from college?
The one who told you about the beautiful secluded place on Orcas Island
translation.es: la que te contósobre el hermoso lugar aislado en Isla Orcas con la renta barata,

translation.en: with the cheap rent?
translation.es: en Isla Orcas con la renta barata,

translation.en: I had her run into you on the street. [sighs]
translation.es: se encontrara contigo en la calle.

translation.en: I tried to stop him.
I blackmailed the CIA to force an investigation into what he did in El Salvador.
translation.es: Chantajeé a la CIA para que investigaranlo que hizo en El Salvador.

translation.en: -You think you saved us? -I knew he'd track you eventually.
translation.es: ¿Crees que nos salvaste? Sabía que las rastrearía.

translation.en: You didn't save us. I got Vee away from him.
translation.es: No nos salvaste. Yo alejé a Vee de él.

translation.en: I took care of her every goddamn day and made sure she was safe.
translation.es: Yo me aseguré de que estuviera a salvo.

translation.en: Now she's out there with him because of you.
translation.es: Y ahora está con él por tu culpa.

translation.en: You're no damn hero. You're a fucking coward.
translation.es: Eres una cobarde, no una heroína.

translation.en: -Wow. -All that rage that that man felt.
translation.es: - Bueno…- Toda esa rabia que sentía él.

translation.en: All the rage inside of that man that he felt,
translation.es: Toda la ira que sentía ese hombre

translation.en: that he aimed towards me, is because of you.
translation.es: y que me dirigía a mí es por ti.

translation.en: Not everybody is meant to be a mother.
translation.es: ¡No todas estamos destinadas a ser madres!

translation.en: Yeah, maybe not.
But you could have been a little more human.
translation.es: Pero podrías haber sido más humana.

translation.en: You drove past our trailer every day. You drove past your own granddaughter, Lou.
translation.es: Pasabas por el remolque todos los días.Pasabas por delante de tu nieta, Lou.

translation.en: You didn't talk to her. You didn't speak to her.
translation.es: No le hablaste ni una vez.

translation.en: You didn't look at her.
What kind of person could do that to their own family?
translation.es: ¿Qué persona le haría eso a su familia?

translation.en: [grunts] Come on. We gotta keep moving.
There ain't no more "we."
Hannah, you don't know where they're going.
You said the lighthouse. I'll follow the coastline.
translation.es: Dijiste que van al faro. Seguiré la costa.

translation.en: Not on your own. It's a trap.
translation.es: No vayas sola. Es una trampa.

translation.en: -Please. There's one thing I'm good for. -Not anymore.
translation.es: Por favor. Hay algo para lo que soy buena. Ya no.

translation.en: You'll just slow me down.
[Philip screaming] Mama! Mama! Mama! Mom!
-Jax. -[barking]
-[grunts] -[Rankin] Lou!
Are you okay?
Never thought I'd be excited to see you.
translation.es: Nunca pensé que me alegraría verte.

translation.en: -First time for everything. -[sighs]
translation.es: Hay una primera vez para todo. ¿Y Hannah?

translation.en: -Where's Hannah? -On her way to the lighthouse.
translation.es: Hay una primera vez para todo. ¿Y Hannah? Se dirige al faro.

translation.en: And her daughter?
translation.es: Se dirige al faro. ¿Y la hija?

translation.en: -Already there with the… -Okay.
…the kidnapper.
He's armed. Very dangerous.
That's exactly what the feds said about you.
translation.es: Eso dijeron los federales de ti.

translation.en: You stay here. I'll send someone for you as soon as the road's clear.
translation.es: Quédate aquí. Enviaré a alguienno bien se despejen los caminos.

translation.en: Wait. For fuck's sake, help me outside. I'm suffocating in here.
translation.es: Espera. Ayúdame a salir. Me ahogo aquí.

translation.en: -Come on. I got this. -[groans]
You gonna tell me why the CIA's lookin' for you, Lou?
translation.es: ¿Me dirás por qué te busca la CIA, Lou?

translation.en: [Lou] I used some evidence I held onto.
-[groans] -What kind of evidence?
Documents. Proving CIA involvement in the coup in Iran.
translation.es: Documentos sobre su participaciónen el golpe de Estado en Irán.

translation.en: Ah. I can see why they'd be pissed about that. -[sighs] -Lou, they're on their way.
translation.es: Entiendo por qué se enojarían por eso.Lou, están en camino.

translation.en: [Lou] Fuck, they won't care about collateral damage.
translation.es: No les importará el daño colateral.

translation.en: You gotta get Hannah and Vee out of there.
translation.es: Ve a rescatar a Hannah y a Vee.

translation.en: [Lou] Come on.
[groans] This thing starts up again, I'm gonna bleed out.
translation.es: Si esto se suelta, voy a desangrarme.

translation.en: Will you get the first-aid kit? I left it in there.
translation.es: Trae el botiquín. Lo dejé ahí dentro.

translation.en: [grunts] Okay.
Lou! Lou!
You gotta be kidding me.
[yells] Lou!
[Vee screams] Mommy!
-[Vee] Mommy! -[Hannah] Vee!
-[Vee] Come! Please, come! -[panting]
-Vee! -I'm here, Mama!
-Up here! -I'm coming!
[breathing heavily] Baby?
-Mommy! -[Hannah laughs]
Hi, Mommy.
[sighs] Hi, baby.
We were afraid you weren't gonna show up. Weren't we, Vee?
translation.es: Teníamos miedo de que no vinieras, ¿no?

translation.en: You okay?
Of course she's okay. She's with her daddy.
translation.es: Claro que está bien. Está con su papá.

translation.en: Come, give Mommy a hug.
Hey, how's-- how's Lou doin'? Is she-- Is she on her way?
Jesus, look at me. [chuckles]
Still waitin' for my mommy to come back after all these years, huh?
translation.es: Sigo esperando a mi mamádespués de todos estos años.

translation.en: But we do need her here to finish this.
translation.es: Pero la necesitamos aquípara terminar esto.

translation.en: I wanna give Mommy a hug.
Philip, please.
[Vee] Please, Daddy?
One quick hug while we wait for Lou.
translation.es: Un abrazo mientras esperamos a Lou.

translation.en: [laughing] Oh, I missed you so much.
[whispers] Game on.
Daddy, may I go to the bathroom?
[Philip] Of course you can, Vee.
But hey… Come right back, okay?
Wow, Lou is really rubbin' off on you.
translation.es: Vaya, Lou sí que te influenció.

translation.en: Come on, just give me the gun. We both know you're not gonna shoot me.
translation.es: Vamos. Dame el arma.Sabemos que no dispararás.

translation.en: You don't know me, Phil. You never did.
translation.es: No me conoces. - Nunca me conociste.- ¿No?

translation.en: [Philip] No?
I know that if you were gonna shoot me, you would have done it years ago.
translation.es: Si fueras a dispararme,lo habrías hecho hace años.

translation.en: I know that you're not like Lou and me.
translation.es: Sé que no eres como Lou y yo.

translation.en: You're not.
Yeah, 'cause she would've shot me already.
Come on. Give me the gun.
You abandon me, and then you steal my baby from me,
translation.es: ¿Me abandonas, me robas a mi bebé y ahora me disparas?

translation.en: and now you shoot me?
translation.es: me robas a mi bebé y ahora me disparas?

translation.en: That shit won't work on me. Not gonna work on me anymore, Phil.
translation.es: ¡Esa mierda no funcionará!Ya no funcionará conmigo, Phil.

translation.en: [shudders] I'm not afraid of you anymore.
And I won't let you hurt my little girl the way you hurt me.
translation.es: Y no dejaré que lastimes a mi hijacomo me lastimaste a mí.

translation.en: -Hannah! -[gasping]
Hannah. Hannah.
Do you remember?
Do you remember…
how it felt?
[shakily] Yeah. [gasping] I remember.
Vee! We have to run!
Vee!
[Hannah] Oh shit.
Vee?
Game's over, okay? Come here, Little Rabbit.
translation.es: Se acabó el juego, ¿sí?Ven aquí, Liebrecita.

translation.en: [groans] We gotta go right now.
Oh! Oh, baby. Come on. Get up. Are you okay?
Did he hurt you? He didn't hurt you, right?
Oh! Hide. Hide. Hide.
-Hannah. -[Hannah] Come on.
-[clattering] -We need to move.
-[Philip] Vee? -[gasps]
-My gun. -[Hannah] Lost it.
-Knife? -Stuck in Philip's hand.
translation.es: - El cuchillo.- Se lo clavé a Philip.

translation.en: Try that hatch. Go, go, now.
-Wait, your jacket's stuck. -[Lou] Oh fuck.
[Hannah] Push you up.
Run to the end of the beach. -Run as fast as you can. -No!
translation.es: Corre rápido hasta que termine la playa.

translation.en: -I'll meet you there. -Don't leave me.
translation.es: - No me dejes.- Nos vemos allí. No cabemos. Vete.

translation.en: We won't fit. You gotta run now. Go, go, go, go.
translation.es: - No me dejes.- Nos vemos allí. No cabemos. Vete. Vamos. ¡Corre, Liebrecita!

translation.en: Run, Little Rabbit! Run!
[Lou] It's rigged. I can't defuse it.
Could buy us some time if I can change the frequency.
translation.es: Ganaré tiempo si cambio la frecuencia.

translation.en: -Wait. Where are you going? -[panting]
One of us was actually a Girl Scout.
translation.es: Yo sí era una niña exploradora.

translation.en: -Do you still have the radio? -Yeah.
Maybe we can use it after all. Go bust that gate open.
translation.es: Tal vez podamos usarla después de todo.Abre la puerta.

translation.en: [Philip] Lou?
We're all here.
We're all here.
I was hoping that we could all do this together.
translation.es: Esperaba que pudiéramos hacer esto juntos…

translation.en: -Face to face! -[bleeping]
So that we could end this… the right way.
translation.es: para ponerle fin como se debe.

translation.en: End this right.
As a family.
As a family.
But sometimes, you don't get what you want.
translation.es: No siempre obtienes lo que quieres.

translation.en: Fuck!
-[gasping] -[Philip yells] Fuck!
[screams] Fuck! You fuckin' let me in!
Oh shit.
-[Lou] Oh shit. -[Hannah] What?
-[Lou] The CIA's on the hunt. -[barks]
[panting] They comin' for Philip or you?
They won't want either one of us to leave here alive.
translation.es: No querrán que ninguno salga con vida.

translation.en: -Go, go. -No.
-I'll just slow you down. -I'm not gonna leave you here.
translation.es: - No. Te retrasaré.- No te dejaré aquí.

translation.en: Lou, go get your granddaughter to safety. I'll catch up.
translation.es: Lou, ocúpate de tu nieta. Las alcanzaré.

translation.en: [yells] Fuck!
Vee…
Oh! Come here.
You're a brave little girl. You know that?
Good. Help me up, will you?
Okay, listen to me. I want you to go grab a stick, okay?
translation.es: Escúchame. Quiero que tomes un palo, ¿sí?

translation.en: The longest one you can find. Go, go, go.
translation.es: El más largo que encuentres. Ve.

translation.en: -Mommy! -Hey, baby.
Hannah. The radio.
[Hannah] In my pocket.
-[Lou] Come on. -[Hannah] Help me.
-All right. -Come on, go, run.
Hannah, hold this up as high as you can.
-[Hannah] Are you calling for help? -[Lou] Yeah.
[Lou] Yeah. That ought to get their attention.
translation.es: Sí, eso debería llamar su atención.

translation.en: You gotta go. Take the road back towards town.
translation.es: Tienen que irse. Toma el camino de regreso al pueblo.Llévate a Jax.

translation.en: -Bring Jax with you. -You… you come with us.
translation.es: Toma el camino de regreso al pueblo.Llévate a Jax. Ven con nosotras.

translation.en: Hannah, you take care of your kid…
I'll take care of mine.
I left a letter for you at my house. Make sure you find it.
translation.es: Te dejé una carta en mi casa.Asegúrate de encontrarla.

translation.en: Okay. Go on, Vee.
Oh, God damn it.
Don't die on me now, Lou.
Everything that matters is right here in front of you.
translation.es: Todo lo que importa está delante de ti.

translation.en: I know.
Go. Now!
I'm sorry, kid.
-Hey, Vee. -[Vee] Hey.
[Rankin] Hello, Jax.
Hey, you got two bracelets now.
Yeah. Just like you.
One's for a friend.
[man] So, out of the blue, she just leaves you and your daughter this house?
translation.es: ¿De la nada les dejóla casa a usted y a su hija?

translation.en: Mm-hm. Yeah, this house and a ton of frozen deer meat.
translation.es: Sí, esta casay mucha carne de venado congelada.

translation.en: It's open.
-Hey, Han. -[Hannah] Hey.
Oh, hello.
You guys still around? We had a few more questions for Ms. Dawson here.
translation.es: - ¿Siguen aquí?- Teníamos más preguntas para ella.

translation.en: Oh. I hope I'm not interrupting.
[clears throat] Hannah, uh, coroner's got an issue.
translation.es: Hannah, el forense tiene un problema.

translation.en: You're next of kin. He needs a signature to release Philip's body for burial.
translation.es: Necesita una firma para entregarel cuerpo de Philip para el entierro.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Yeah. Sorry.
Ms. Dawson, did Lou Adell ever mention
translation.es: Señorita Dawson, ¿Lou Adell mencionó algún documentode su época en la CIA?

translation.en: anything about documents from her time in the CIA to you?
translation.es: ¿Lou Adell mencionó algún documentode su época en la CIA?

translation.en: She'd be a pretty shit spy if she did.
translation.es: No, o sería una pésima espía.

translation.en: If you think of anything…
[chuckles] You gave me a card last time you were here, and the time before that.
translation.es: Me dio su tarjetalas últimas dos veces que vino.

translation.en: Anything at all.
All right.
-[agent] Sheriff. -Good to see you again.
-Forget them. -Mm.
Looks like you two are ready for Seattle.
translation.es: Parece que están listas para Seattle.

translation.en: Yeah, you're all packed up.
Yeah, almost.
I wanted to tell you, you just did a beautiful job with the memorial service.
translation.es: Hiciste un trabajo hermoso con el funeral.

translation.en: -Stop. -No, you did. And I think Lou would have really appreciated it.
translation.es: De verdad. Y Lou lo habría agradecido.

translation.en: [scoffs] Come on now. All that sincere emotion would have made her puke.
translation.es: Por favor. Tanta sensibilidadla habría hecho vomitar.

translation.en: Oh, well…
-She was her own person. -Mm-hm.
I mean, sometimes, I'm just so damn mad at her, and then…
translation.es: A veces, estoy tan enojada con ella…

translation.en: [sighs] Other times I miss her.
Isn't that just how it is with family?
[Lou] "I've never been one for many words, so I'll keep this short."
translation.es: Nunca he sidouna mujer de muchas palabras, así que seré breve.

translation.en: "The house is yours. Sell it."
"There's a month's worth of meat for Jax in the freezer, and some cash for you."
translation.es: Hay carne para un mes para Jaxen el congelador y algo de dinero para ti.

translation.en: "Life doesn't give you second chances, but sometimes it does offer a fresh start."
translation.es: La vida no te da segundas oportunidades,pero a veces ofrece un nuevo comienzo.

translation.en: "Hannah, you're going to wonder why I did it." "Why I left this all for you."
translation.es: Hannah, te preguntarás por qué lo hice.Por qué te dejé todo esto.

translation.en: "The simple answer is,
you'll leave the world a better place than I did."
translation.es: harás del mundo un lugar mejor que yo.
